content: Now I don’t do this often, seeing as it’s the internet but I have a ring? 🤣 Seriously, thank you. The bystanders are the answer; why? Because victimhood for all the cries of “fight back” is paralyzing. You don’t ask the kid trapped in the chaos of the fire and smoke to man up, you pray for the fireman. We are the firemen and I absolutely love how you look in your fire suit! You grab that hose and save tomorrow. This is me cheering from 3 floors down!
